edge: The original score and songs for the movie 'Rock On!!' were composed by the Indian music trio Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy.
The lyrics of the songs in 'Rock On!!' were written by the Indian lyricist Javed Akhtar.
According to the Indian trade website Box Office India, with around 12,00,000 units sold, this film's soundtrack album was the year's thirteenth highest-selling.
